summary: Frontend testing of OMEGA Dashboard UI/UX Revisions. All 17 features tested with 100% success rate. Quick Access Bar has larger icons (w-10 h-10) with full readable titles. Node Avatar Strip has larger avatars (w-16 h-16) with always-visible status labels. Node Details Drawer has Copy/Expand/Maps buttons. Power Tile has field-use summary row with Fahrenheit temperature. Community Tile has Status Report feature with Share as Alert toggle and Image poll toggle. All data is MOCKED.
critical_code_review_comments: All data is MOCKED - no real Pi backend integration
Quick Access Bar: HotkeysBar.jsx uses w-10 h-10 icons with gap-3 spacing for glove-friendly tap targets
Node Avatar Strip: NodeAvatarStrip.jsx uses w-16 h-16 avatars with gap-4 spacing and always-visible status labels
Node Details Drawer: NodeDetailsDrawer.jsx has Copy/Expand/Maps buttons with proper data-testid attributes
Power Tile: PowerTile.jsx has field-use summary row showing Battery% | Runtime | Net flow | Draw | Top source
Power Tile: Temperature displayed in Fahrenheit (82째F) using formula: Math.round(battery.temperature * 9/5 + 32)
Power Tile: Runtime Critical checklist exists but only shows when runtime < 60 min (mock has 245 min)
Community Tile: CommunityTile.jsx has Status Report button that auto-generates #StatusReport with device stats
Community Tile: Share as Alert toggle appears after Status Report is generated
Community Tile: Image poll toggle exists with '(coming soon)' label - UI-stubbed feature
test_credentials: None required - all data is mocked
seed_data_creation: Mock data provided by getMockPowerData() in PowerTile.jsx and getMockFeed() in CommunityTile.jsx
context_for_next_testing_agent: UI/UX revisions fully tested. Key test IDs: hotkeys-bar, hotkey-comms, hotkey-map, customize-hotkeys-btn, node-avatar-strip, node-avatars, node-avatar-omega-01, node-details-drawer, copy-coords-btn, expand-map-btn, open-maps-btn, power-tile, field-summary, net-flow, battery-main, runtime-critical (conditional), power-help-btn, community-tile, new-post-btn, new-post-composer, status-report-btn, filter-all, filter-alert, filter-poll

quick_access_bar_minimal_design.details: Quick Access Bar renders with minimal design, 'Quick Access' label, and Customize button

quick_access_larger_icons.details: Hotkey buttons have w-10 h-10 icons (verified in code and visually)

quick_access_full_titles.details: Full readable titles visible: Comms Hub, Map, Flashlight, SOS Beacon, Field Notes, Power

quick_access_generous_spacing.details: Buttons have gap-3 spacing for glove-friendly tap targets

node_avatar_larger_size.details: Node avatars are w-16 h-16 (larger for clear visibility)

node_avatar_status_labels_visible.details: Status labels ALWAYS visible (not just on hover): GOOD, OKAY, NEED HELP, OFFLINE

node_avatar_gps_indicator.details: GPS text indicator shows 'GPS' next to green dot when node has coordinates

node_avatar_generous_spacing.details: Avatar cards have gap-4 spacing between them

node_drawer_copy_coords.details: Copy coordinates button found and functional (copies lat,lon to clipboard)

node_drawer_expand_map.details: Expand button found (placeholder for larger map view)

node_drawer_open_maps.details: Open in Maps button found (opens Google Maps)

power_tile_field_summary.details: Field-use summary row shows: 72% | 4h 5m | -0.8W | 11.5W | Top: Solar

power_tile_runtime_checklist.details: Runtime Critical checklist component exists in code (only shows when runtime < 60 min, mock has 245 min)

community_status_report_button.details: 'Post Status Report' button found in composer

community_status_report_content.details: Status Report auto-generates #StatusReport with Battery%, GPS, Comms summary

community_share_as_alert.details: 'Share as Alert' toggle appears after Status Report is generated

community_image_poll_toggle.details: Image poll toggle found in Poll composer with '(coming soon)' label - UI-stubbed

community_filter_tabs.details: Filter tabs (All, Alerts, Polls) working correctly for alert filtering

screenshots_taken: 01_quick_access_bar.jpeg - Quick Access Bar with larger icons and full titles
04_node_strip_visible.jpeg - Node Avatar Strip with status labels visible
09_power_tile.jpeg - Power Tile with field-use summary row
17_community_bottom.jpeg - Community Tile at bottom of page

mocked_apis_list: getMockPowerData() - returns battery 72%, runtime 245 min, net flow -0.8W, temp 28째C (82째F)
getMockFeed() - returns 5 posts: 1 alert, 1 poll, 3 regular posts
getMockStatusData() - returns battery 72%, GPS 3D fix, comms status for Status Report
allyApi.getNodeStatus() - returns mock node details with GPS coordinates
